itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Jerry Wayne who got a lot of attention for calling out Joe Biden about his stance on 2A rights in Detroit at the Fiat Chrysler plant and discuss the altercation, talk about what the key to bipartisan ...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Jerry Wayne who got a lot of attention for calling out Joe Biden about his stance on 2A rights in Detroit at the Fiat Chrysler plant and discuss the altercation, talk about what the key to bipartisan unanimity and the possible cure to Coronavirus.

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Jerry Wayne who got a lot of attention for calling out Joe Biden about his stance on 2A rights in Detroit at the Fiat Chrysler plant and discuss the altercation, talk about what the key to bipartisan unanimity and the possible cure to Coronavirus.
